title: Need Help with High ping in game
body:
hi, i'm from San Diego, CA using at&t service provider and i am getting spiking ping of 200+ every game. My normal playable ping hovers around 75-80 but recently when i switched to at&t, it began spiking up to 200+. Is there someone can help me resolve this or is having the same issues?
Thanks in advance! <3

replies.body: It could just be from switching ISP's but let's take a look at how your connection fares on it's way to our servers. Run a quick traceroute using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to the NA server at 104.160.131.1 and post those results here for me. Should be able to spot any troubles with packet loss if that's the main problem.
also. my connection is through wifi..
